summary: All four requirements appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is addressed in excelParser.ts with a DD/MM/YYYY parser and corrected serial number conversion. REQ-2, REQ-3, and REQ-4 are addressed in TotalOrdersTab.tsx with search filtering, full-row click selection, per-group Mark Ready buttons, and a top-level bulk Mark Ready button. The file summary descriptions align with all acceptance criteria.
